doc.after: A primary flight display or PFD is a modern aircraft instrument dedicated to flight information Much like multi function displays primary flight displays are built around an Liquid crystal display or CRT display device Representations of older six pack or steam gauge instruments are combined on one compact display simplifying pilot workflow and streamlining cockpit layouts
